about_the_game:
Paint a portrait of the age of mythology and adventure in Asian cultures! Using the sounds of traditional instruments from China, Japan, and beyond, this is music fit for honorable duels, idyllic villages, and journeys across epic landscapes.

Taken from the full length 'Asian Empires Music Pack', these twelve tracks expand upon the 2013 release 'Asian Empires Mini Bundle'.

Features:

- 12 BGM tracks suitable for battle, dungeons, field, themes and towns! (These 12 tracks are also in 'Asian Empires Music Pack'. Please take note to avoid duplicate purchases)
- .ogg, and .m4a formats included

* This pack is considered to be an expansion pack for those who already own the 2013 release 'Asian Empires Mini Bundle' to add to that pack and complete the full 20 song collection.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
